title: Birthday in Regensburg: permanent parliament
brief_description: The 300th birthday of the Reichstag of Regensburg, a predecessor of the German parliamentary system, offered the occasion for a review of its effects on German history, its tasks and its organisation.
description: The 300th birthday of the Reichstag of Regensburg, a predecessor of the German parliamentary system, offered the occasion for a review of its effects on German history, its tasks and its organisation.
